items.question: What payment methods do you support?
items.answer: We support all major credit cards, debit cards, digital wallets (Apple Pay, Google Pay), and ACH transfers.

items.question: How secure are your payment solutions?
items.answer: Our platform uses industry-standard encryption, is PCI DSS compliant, and includes fraud detection systems.

categories.name: Merchant Services
categories.description: Questions about our merchant services offerings

items.question: What are your processing fees?
items.answer: Our processing fees vary based on your business volume and type. Contact us for a custom quote.

items.question: How long does merchant onboarding take?
items.answer: Most merchants can be onboarded within 1-2 business days after providing all required documentation.

items.question: How do I integrate your payment gateway?
items.answer: We provide comprehensive API documentation and SDKs for major programming languages. Our support team can guide you through the integration process.

items.question: What happens if there's a payment failure?
items.answer: Our system automatically retries failed payments and provides detailed error messages. You'll receive notifications for any issues requiring attention.
